title: attemp to join queue failed
body: I was at  champion  selection and suddenly kicked out somehow and the  message attempt to join queue   failed appears without any notification that anybody left the game  .It happened again sometimes.I don't know what happened but i can't have to wait 15  for this                                                        when  it's not my fault.

replies.body:
Hmmmm it really sounds like you were dropped out of the game lobby, possibly from a hiccup in your connection if you were removed without a message that someone else had left the match. Sometimes that can happen if you've got an unstable connection with wifi or just some kind of interference. 

Try switching to an ethernet connection if at all possible, if not go some general troubleshooting like adjusting your DNS server settings to 8.8.8.8/8.8.4.4 in your network settings. If you aren't sure how to do that, check for those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
